named-query.name: BpJpaKeyIndex_getIndexedKeys
named-query.query: SELECT x.keyName FROM BpJpaKeyIndex x where x.elementType = :elementType

named-query.name: BpJpaKeyIndex_getKeyIndex
named-query.query: SELECT x FROM BpJpaKeyIndex x where x.elementType = :elementType AND x.keyName = :keyName

named-query.name: BpJpaKeyIndex_getElementsByUsingKeyIndex
named-query.query: SELECT p.element FROM BpJpaKeyIndexedProperty i, BpJpaProperty p where i.propertyId = p.id AND i.indexValue = :indexValue AND i.keyName = :keyName AND i.elementType = :elementType
